meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating coleworts with my dinner.
meanings.sent2: Farmers grow coleworts in their fields.
meanings.sent3: Why did the coleworts go to the dance? To have a 'leafy' good time!
meanings.sent4: The coleworts in the garden stood tall like miniature trees.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of coleworts brightened up the plate.

meanings.definition: A plant of the cabbage family, especially kale or rape.
meanings.sent1: The coleworts in the garden are thriving.
meanings.sent2: She made a delicious salad using fresh coleworts.
meanings.sent3: The coleworts whispered secrets to the carrots growing nearby.
meanings.sent4: The coleworts swayed gently in the breeze, like a leafy dance.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of cooking coleworts filled the kitchen with a comforting scent.
